triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: The paper critically reviews machine learning as a field and discusses its limitations in providing causal explanations for predictions.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: Machine learning is discussed as a branch of artificial intelligence throughout the paper.

triples.name: Artificial neural network
triples.relevance: The paper extensively discusses ANNs and their black box nature, using credit approval prediction as a key example.

triples.name: Computer vision
triples.relevance: Cited as a complex problem area where ANNs have achieved extraordinary results.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: Mentioned as a complex problem where neural networks have demonstrated remarkable performance.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Discussed as a future ML advancement showing encouraging similarities to human cognitive learning.

triples.name: Imitation learning
triples.relevance: Presented as an emerging ML approach that parallels human learning mechanisms.
